name: Underworld (MAC404)
description:
Underworld is a small platform game about a little robot trying to escape from the deadly test chambers of a strange factory that is inconveniently being destroyed by a volcanic eruption.  ;)

CONTROLS :

  • WASD / Arrow Keys
  • N Key - Mute / Unmute SFXs
  • M Key - Mute / Unmute OSTs

Game by  mac404

Music by White Bat Audio

this is my first game btw

pls give me feedback :)
